expo.name: Wordle

infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This identifier will be used to deliver personalized content.

web.name: Wordle
web.description: Guess the hidden word in 6 tries. A new puzzle is available each day!

expo.description: Guess the hidden 5-letter word in 6 tries. Each guess reveals clues: green means correct letter and position, yellow means correct letter but wrong position, gray means the letter is not in the word. A new puzzle is available each day!
